veteranTalents.name: Confirmed Kill
veteranTalents.description: Replenish 25% Toughness on Elite kill and a further 25% Toughness over time.

veteranTalents.name: Exhilarating Takedown
veteranTalents.description: Replenish 10% Toughness on ranged weak spot kill.

veteranTalents.name: At Arm's Length
veteranTalents.description: Replenish 5% Toughness per second while more than 8 metres from enemies.

veteranTalents.name: Sniper
veteranTalents.description: Deal up to 20% increased damage based on the distance between you and the target.

veteranTalents.name: Tactical Reload
veteranTalents.description: +20% reload speed if you have ammo in your weapon.

veteranTalents.name: Bio-Optic Targeting
veteranTalents.description: Volley Fire Designates non-Ogryn Elites and Specialists as Priority Targets for Allies in Coherency.

veteranTalents.name: Demolition Team
veteranTalents.description: You and allies in Coherency have a 5% chance to gain a Grenade on enemy kill.

veteranTalents.name: Covering Fire
veteranTalents.description: When you kill an enemy with a ranged attack, allies in melee range of the target replenish 10% Toughness.

veteranTalents.name: Unwavering Focus
veteranTalents.description: +75% Toughness damage reduction from ranged attacks during Volley Fire.

veteranTalents.name: Duck and Dive
veteranTalents.description: Dodging, sprinting or sliding to avoid ranged attacks grants 20% stamina.

veteranTalents.name: Camo Expert
veteranTalents.description: While standing still, enemies are significantly less likely to target you.

veteranTalents.name: Frag Storm
veteranTalents.description: Frag Grenades apply 8 stacks of Bleed to all enemies hit.

veteranTalents.name: Deadshot
veteranTalents.description: +25% Critical Chance and 60% Sway Reduction, but lose 10% Stamina per second while using your weapons Alt fire.

veteranTalents.name: Sustained Fire
veteranTalents.description: Volley Fire Reloads your weapon and Replenishes 60% Toughness. Killing a Designated Enemy during Volley Fire refreshes its duration.

veteranTalents.name: Counterfire
veteranTalents.description: +25% Weak Spot Damage during Volley Fire. Volley Fire now Designates all Scab Shooters as Priority Targets. Killing a Designated Enemy during Volley Fire refreshes its duration.

veteranTalents.name: The Bigger they Are...
veteranTalents.description: +50% Damage (Ogryns and Monstrosities) during Volley Fire. Volley Fire Designates Ogryns and Monstrosities as Priority Targets. Killing a Designated Enemy during Volley Fire refreshes its duration.
